title: Sam. Ld. Bp. of Oxon, his celebrated reasons for abrogating the test and notions of idolatry, answered by Samuel, Arch-Deacon of Canterbury.
author: Phillips, John, 1631-1706.
notes: "Samuel Parker was Archdeacon of Canterbury in 1686 when he became Bishop of Oxford"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Phillips.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library.
